    • Method Detail

      • getCourses

        @GetMapping
public java.util.List<CourseDto> getCourses​(@RequestBody
                                            SearchFilterDto searchFilterDto)
        Finding and filtering courses
        Parameters:
        searchFilterDto - filter parameters: status - filter by status (is the course started, finished and etc), teacherName - filter by teacher name, teacherSurname - filter by teacher surname, theme - filter by course theme, minRating - find courses with rating not less than given, online - find online / offline courses, address - filter by address, free - find only free courses, minCost - find courses with cost not less than given, maxCost - find courses with cost not greater than given, numberOfPlaces - find courses with number of places left not less than given, individual - find individual / group courses, from - find courses starting after given date, to - find courses finishing before given date
        Returns:
        filtered list of courses

      • getCourseLessons

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'READ\')")
@GetMapping("/{id}/lessons")
public java.util.List<LessonDto> getCourseLessons​(@PathVariable
                                                  java.lang.Long id)
        Parameters:
        id - id of the course
        Returns:
        lessons which belong to current course

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADD\')")

public CourseDto addCourse​(@RequestBody

      • updateLessonStatuses

        @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'EDIT\')")
@PostMapping("/{id}/update_statuses")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> updateLessonStatuses​(@PathVariable
                                                                                      java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                      @RequestParam(required=false) @DateTimeFormat(pattern="dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm")
                                                                                      java.time.LocalDateTime currentTime)
        Parameters:
        id - id of the course whose status and lesson statuses should be updated
        currentTime - time according to which the statuses should be updated
        Returns:
        message about success of status updates
